camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.serviceUrl.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.serviceUrl
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.serviceUrl.description: The Pulsar Service URL to point while creating the client from URI.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.authenticati.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.authenticationClass
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.authenticati.description: The Authentication FQCN to be used while creating the client from URI.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.authenticati.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.authenticationParams
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.authenticati.description: The Authentication Parameters to be used while creating the client from URI.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.consumerName.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.consumerNamePrefix
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.consumerName.description: Prefix to add to consumer names when a SHARED or FAILOVER subscription is used

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.deadLetterTo.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.deadLetterTopic
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.deadLetterTo.description: Name of the topic where the messages which fail maxRedeliverCount times will be sent. Note: if not set, default topic name will be topicName-subscriptionName-DLQ.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.maxRedeliver.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.maxRedeliverCount
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.maxRedeliver.description: Maximum number of times that a message will be redelivered before being sent to the dead letter queue. If this value is not set, no Dead Letter Policy will be created.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.messageListe.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.messageListener
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.messageListe.description: Whether to use the messageListener interface, or to receive messages using a separate thread pool.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.numberOfCons.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.numberOfConsumerThreads
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.numberOfCons.description: Number of threads to receive and handle messages when using a separate thread pool.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.subscription.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.subscriptionInitialPosition
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.subscription.description: Control the initial position in the topic of a newly created subscription. Default is latest message.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.subscription.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.subscriptionName
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.subscription.description: Name of the subscription to use.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.subscription.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.subscriptionTopicsMode
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.subscription.description: Determines to which topics this consumer should be subscribed to - Persistent, Non-Persistent, or both. Only used with pattern subscriptions.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.topicsPatter.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.topicsPattern
camel.kamelet.pulsar-source.topicsPatter.description: Whether the topic is a pattern (regular expression) that allows the consumer to subscribe to all matching topics in the namespace.
